outputs.output_descr:
The main objective of the project is the development of a National Gender Policy and Action Plan. This is to be accomplished through:
1) The preparation of a concept paper on social, economic and gender justice.
2) The production of radio scripts and video documentaries.
3) Preparation of specific thematic/sector policy papers.
4) Preparation, production and dissemination of a draft policy and five year plan for Gender Equality incorporating recommendations from consultations, policy round-tables and community focus group meetings.

project_descr: PREPARATION OF A NATIONAL GENDER POLICY AND PLAN
